Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to banning push notifications from a food service establishment or a third-party delivery platform to minors
Summary: Bans push notifications from a food service establishment or a third-party delivery platform to minors.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to banning push notifications from a food service establishment or a third-party food delivery platform to minors
